select s.*, sm.studystatus, COUNT(DISTINCT c.no) AS countcomm, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN sa.status = '대기' THEN sa.no ELSE NULL END) AS pendingcount from studyboard s left join studyboardcomm c on s.no = c.studyboardno left join studyapplication sa on s.no = sa.studyboardno left join studymanagement sm on s.no = sm.studyboardno where 1=1
and s.booktitle like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and s.id like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
group by s.no order by state limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT s.*, b.isbn13, b.author, b.pubDate, b.categoryName, b.description, b.customerReviewRank, b.page, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.status = '승인' THEN 1 END) AS approved FROM studyboard s JOIN book b ON s.booktitle = b.title LEFT JOIN studyapplication a ON s.no = a.studyboardno WHERE s.no = #{no} GROUP BY s.no, b.isbn13, b.author, b.pubDate, b.categoryName, b.description, b.customerReviewRank, b.page;
mapper.insert: insert into studyevent (studyBoardNo, title, start, end, className) values (#{studyBoardNo}, #{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{className})
insert into studyboardcomm (id, studyboardno, content, ref, lev, seq, created) values (#{id}, #{studyboardno}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, now())
insert into studyapplication (studyboardno, applicationId, applicationContent, requestDate, responseDate) values (#{studyboardno}, #{applicationId}, #{applicationContent}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select * from studyapplication where studyboardno = #{studyboardno} and status = '승인'
mapper.insert: insert into studymanagement (studyboardno, studystart, studyend, studyperiod, leaderId, booktitle, studystatus) values (#{studyboardno}, #{studystart}, #{studyend}, #{studyperiod}, #{leaderId}, #{booktitle}, #{studystatus})
insert into studymember (studyboardno, memberId, role) values (#{studyboardno}, #{leaderId}, 'leader')
mapper.select: SELECT sm.*, sb.title, GROUP_CONCAT(sm2.memberId SEPARATOR ',') AS memberIds FROM studymanagement sm JOIN studyboard sb ON sm.studyboardno = sb.no LEFT JOIN studymember sm2 ON sm.studyboardno = sm2.studyboardno WHERE sm.studyboardno IN ( SELECT studyboardno FROM studymember WHERE memberId = #{loginId} ) GROUP BY sm.studyboardno, sb.title;

SELECT sm.*, sb.title, sb.bookcover, sb.content, sb.startdate, sb.enddate, sb.challengestart, sb.challengeend, sb.quota, sb.state, GROUP_CONCAT(sbm.memberId) AS memberIds, b.author, b.pubDate, b.categoryName, b.page FROM studymanagement sm LEFT JOIN studymember sbm ON sm.studyboardno = sbm.studyboardno LEFT JOIN studyboard sb ON sm.studyboardno = sb.no LEFT JOIN book b ON sb.booktitle = b.title WHERE sm.studyboardno = #{studyboardno} GROUP BY sm.studyboardno, sb.title, sb.booktitle, sb.bookcover, sb.content, sb.startdate, sb.enddate, sb.challengestart, sb.challengeend, sb.quota, sb.state, b.author, b.pubDate, b.categoryName, b.page;
mapper.insert: insert into studyapproval (studyboardno, sort, approvalBookTitle, approvalContent, proposer, proposeDate, changeStatusDate) values (#{studyboardno}, #{sort}, #{approvalBookTitle}, #{approvalContent}, #{proposer}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from studyapproval where studyboardno = #{studyboardno} and approvalStatus = '대기'
